name: Pinky 2 - Find differences
description:
We have selected most adorable and funny images in volume 2 for you.

Find a seven differences in cutest photos with pets, children and animals like panda, fox, goat and parrot. Of course puppies and kitties are also included :)

You can play any picture you want any time. Use Zoom and Hint to spot hardest differences and make game cosy.

Train your attention with pleasure with best Find differences game series ever!
